name: The Beetle in the Room
description:
The Beetle in the Room

Enter the adventure of trying to escape from an inescapable room, the more you try, the more you score, will you be able to surpass yourself each new try?

How To Play

Move your character through the edges of the game, crossing these edges will increase your score and get more life points.

The more you play, the more chances you have to survive.

Controls

AD - move that butt(movement)

K - move that butt, but up(jump)

~Fun facts~

There are ssome score numbers that when obtained give special messages, will you read them all?

017426996991004044206667779991000111133129991000099999100000
